knimeNode.name: Proteowizard Show Config
knimeNode.shortDescription: Displays the features supported by an MSConvertEE server, so that the user can determine which pipeline steps will function as far as Proteomics data processing is concerned

fullDescription.intro: Displays the features supported by an MSConvertEE server, so that the user can determine which pipeline steps will function as far as Proteomics data processing is concerned. MSConvertEE supports most features provided by Proteowizard's msconvert, and has many of the same limitations since it uses it, and optionally, vendor specific DLL's too. Remember that the server must be installed with the appropriate vendor software to function with vendor raw data. This requires agreement to the vendor's software license.

ports.outPort: A table of spectra loaded from the converted files
